flawed_nl_solution:
Tommy has a total of 20 x 3 = <<20*3=60>>60 kilograms of tomatoes.
Only 60 - 3 = <<60-3=60>>60 kilograms can be sold.
His earnings for the tomatoes will be $60*6=360.
Thus, his profit will be $360 - $330 = $<<360-330=30>>30.
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 57, not 60. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
